title: Guest Lecture: Inventing a mechatronic transmission
description: In this talk and workshop, Tony Wong will discuss his invention: A new kind of transmission that uses high speed mechatronics to instantaneously “change gears” in a way that has never been done before. Tony will share technical information not previously released in public, and will also talk about his company’s challenges of developing and patenting his invention, raising capital, and the current endeavor of bringing it to market.
